name: 2025 8th International Conference on Aeronautical, Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering
content: Conference Proceedings: All papers will be peer-reviewed by members of the Program Committee and be evaluated for originality, significance of the contribution, technical correctness. Accepted papers being presented at the conference by at least one of the authors will be published into Journal of Physics: Conference Series (JPCS), which submitted for Ei Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec index, et al.
